Description:
Detects PowerShell script execution via input stream redirect

Author: Moriarty Meng (idea), Anton Kutepov (rule), oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Run PowerShell Script from Redirected Input Stream
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (process_path like '%\powershell.exe' or process_path like '%\pwsh.exe') and command re '\s-\s*<'
